text: Robert Leszek Moczulski (, 7 June 1930 – 10 October 2024) was a Polish historian and politician. He was a member of many government organizations as a critic of communism. From 1993 to 1997, he was a member of Sejm. He is a member of the Confederation of Independent Poland.Leszek Moczulski, Zyciorys, Biography at Ksiazki.wp.pl Moczulski was born in Warsaw. Moczulski died in Warsaw on 10 October 2024 at the age of 94.Leszek Moczulski Zmarł Leszek Moczulski, działacz opozycji antykomunistycznej ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Politicians from Warsaw Category:Writers from Warsaw Category:Polish historians
title: Leszek Moczulski
